W02_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found Pulchra, a world inhabited by colorful witches, on the other side of the door. Their way of life is under threat from a calamity, and you must watch over this conflict.

W02_EVAR_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.text: Your final task as the Watcher awaits. Once you enter the Brilliant Tower, you won't be able to turn back.

W02_EVAR_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_900_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_900_DETAIL.text: Should you really trust some mysterious voice over the Arch Witch?

W02_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: The Calamity has engulfed all, leaving the Witchdom of Pulchra silent as the grave. There is nothing left for you in this world.

W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_DETAIL.text: Pulchra contains many witches for you to watch over. Areas colored red are in particular danger.

W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_DETAIL.text: Someone currently holds the triangle you seekâ€”but who?
